system.description: At 7th level, you gain one of the following rogue skill tricks, treating your scholar level as your rogue level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.053x8effld16m9px]{Cat's Eyes}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00lugck9mh8o95rl]{Observer}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.vpjy24qtc7eydt4n]{Keen Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.19ngv3ym6jnanuvp]{Quick Scan}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xv4w7gg8nddpnowc]{Sense for Secrets}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qfogs0bp2hisfr1n]{Sense Aura}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.529hrlabc43he0ut]{Delay Trap}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3a1d88q5wa93a01f]{Locksmith}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.9p0ktbpp3qse6ybh]{Skeleton Key}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.5q44z6dgicdayr54]{Expertise Training} applying only to Thieves' Tools, Perception, or Investigation.  You gain another one at levels 10, 14, and 18.
